name: ensureErrorType
signature: <E>() => <A, E2 extends E, R>(effect: Effect<A, E2, R>) => Effect<A, E2, R>
description:
A no-op type constraint that enforces the error channel of an Effect conforms to
the specified error type `E`.
documentation:
A no-op type constraint that enforces the error channel of an Effect conforms to
the specified error type `E`.
